text: Ra Anumzamoka kagra fatgo kavukva nehana ne' mani'nananki, ruotage'ma hu'nea agonakare'ma me'nea Jerusalemi kumakuma krimpama ahenentana zana atro. Na'ankure tagri tvaonte'ma mani kagi'naza vahe'mo'za, tagrama huna kumimo'ene tagehe'mozama hu'naza kumi'mo hige'za, Jerusalemi kuma'ene kagri vahekura kiza zokago ke hurante'naze.
